jsdp.sdp

Class ValueRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsdp.sdp.ValueRepository
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    sS_CostRepository

    public class ValueRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction representing a repository for the value associated with each State.
    Author:
    Roberto Rossi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ValueRepository(ImmediateValueFunction<State,Action,java.lang.Double> immediateValueFunction)
      Creates a new value repository.

      Creates a new value repository.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ValueRepository

        public ValueRepository(ImmediateValueFunction<State,Action,java.lang.Double> immediateValueFunction)
        Creates a new value repository. This implementation is based on ConcurrentHashMap.
        Parameters:
        immediateValueFunction - the immediate value of a transition from initialState to finalState under a chosen action.

      • ValueRepository

        public ValueRepository(ImmediateValueFunction<State,Action,java.lang.Double> immediateValueFunction,
                       int stateSpaceSizeLowerBound,
                       float loadFactor)
        Creates a new value repository. This implementation is based on Trove4j THashMap.
        Parameters:
        immediateValueFunction - the immediate value of a transition from initialState to finalState under a chosen action.
        stateSpaceSizeLowerBound - a lower bound for the sdp state space size, used to initialise the internal hash maps
        loadFactor - the internal hash maps load factor

    • Method Detail

      • getExpectedValue

        public double getExpectedValue(State initialState,
                               Action action,
                               TransitionProbability transitionProbability)
        Returns the expected value associated with initialState and action under one-step transition probabilities described in transitionProbability.
        Parameters:
        initialState - the initial state of the stochastic process.
        action - the chosen action.
        transitionProbability - the transition probabilities of the stochastic process.
        Returns:
        the expected value associated with initialState and action under one-step transition probabilities described in transitionProbability.

      • setOptimalExpectedValue

        public void setOptimalExpectedValue(State state,
                                    double expectedValue)
        Associates an optimal expected value expectedValue to state.
        Parameters:
        state - the target state.
        expectedValue - the optimal expected total cost.

      • getOptimalExpectedValue

        public double getOptimalExpectedValue(State state)
        Returns the optimal expected value associated with state.
        Parameters:
        state - the target state.
        Returns:
        the optimal expected value.

      • setOptimalAction

        public void setOptimalAction(State state,
                             Action action)
        Associates an optimal action action to state state.
        Parameters:
        state - the target state.
        action - the optimal action.

      • getOptimalAction

        public Action getOptimalAction(State state)
        Returns the optimal action associated with state.
        Parameters:
        state - the target state.
        Returns:
        the optimal action.
